patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Hotfix 22.13.3
patchlogs.changes: Adarza Kavat’s Cat’s Eye Critical Chance Buff no longer apply to Operators.

patchlogs.name: Update: Specters of the Rail
patchlogs.changes: Adarza Kavat grants increased critical chance to all nearby Tenno for a short duration.

name: Chesa Kubrow
description: This Kubrow will disarm adversaries and retrieve the spoils of battle.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Update 22.5.0 + 22.5.0.1
patchlogs.changes: Improvements towards the Chesa Kubrow Retrieve functionality when retrieving items in nearby crates and when in the Plains.

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Hotfix 21.2.1
patchlogs.changes: Optimized Feral and Chesa Kubrow AI to reduce time spent looking for pickups.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.6.3
patchlogs.fixes: Improved the interaction between the Chesa Kubrow’s Scavenge and Retrieve Abilities, reducing the amount of downtime between the Kubrow smashing crates and picking up items.

patchlogs.name: Update 18.5: Sands of Inaros
patchlogs.fixes:
The Chesa Kubrow will now be more responsive when picking up multiple items in close proximity.
Fixed Chesa Kubrow getting stuck when trying to pick up unreachable items.
Fixed Chesa Kubrow becoming stuck when trying to attack a crate it can’t reach.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.4.7
patchlogs.changes: Chesa Kubrow now instantly pick up dropped non-Mod items instead of bringing them back to the player.  Mods will be carried back to the player as normal.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.8.0
patchlogs.additions: Due to an error in Kubrow egg type generation many players hunting for Chesa Kubrow have been unable to obtain the breed since the release of Chesa without purchasing the egg from the Market.  While the error has been fixed we understand the frustration this has caused Kubrow enthusiasts, and will be releasing an alert that offers 2 Chesa Kubrow Genetic Code Templates as a reward.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an error preventing the Chesa Kubrow from being a potential egg type on drop tables.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Chesa Kubrow`s name and description not displaying on the Imprint display screen.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.0.4
patchlogs.changes: The Chesa Kubrow’s Retrieve ability will now grab multiple items at once.

name: Dna Stabilizers
description: Contains 6 DNA Stabilizers to maintain the health of a Kubrow or Kavat.

name: Genetic Code Template
description: Copies the dominant genes of a pet onto the template. This can then be used to increase the chances that traits from the original pet will carry across to a newborn clone.

components.name: Blueprint
components.description: Copies the dominant genes of a pet onto the template. This can then be used to increase the chances that traits from the original pet will carry across to a newborn clone.

components.name: Control Module
components.description: Autonomy processor for Robotics. A Corpus design.

components.name: Nano Spores
components.description: Fibrous technocyte tumour. Handle Infested tissue with caution.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.8.0
patchlogs.additions: Due to an error in Kubrow egg type generation many players hunting for Chesa Kubrow have been unable to obtain the breed since the release of Chesa without purchasing the egg from the Market.  While the error has been fixed we understand the frustration this has caused Kubrow enthusiasts, and will be releasing an alert that offers 2 Chesa Kubrow Genetic Code Templates as a reward.

name: Helminth Charger
description: An Infested pet bred from the Helminth Cyst

patchlogs.name: The Sacrifice: Update 23.2.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Little Helper Hat not sitting correctly when equipped on the Helminth Charger Metus Kubrow Skin.

patchlogs.name: The Sacrifice: Hotfix 23.1.3
patchlogs.fixes:
Adorn any Kubrow or Helminth Charger Pet with a battery of gothic spikes.
Everything you need to become the ultimate terror. Includes the unholy Nidus Phryke Skin, Deimos Claw Skin, Nosos Syandana, Helminth Charger Metus Skin and Metus Kubrow Armor.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Update 22.15.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Kubrow Armor not appearing on Helminth Chargers with Drahk Skin equipped.

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Hotfix 20.0.9
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed custom energy color on the Helminth Charger not being very noticeable.

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Hotfix 20.0.6
patchlogs.changes:
All Helminth Chargers bred before Update 20 had the same default color scheme (pink/orange) that was originally only meant as their eye color. As a result, Chargers bred before Update 20, who currently do not have custom colors, have had their default colors rerolled to something new!
Added Energy color option for the Helminth Charger customizations in Arsenal.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Little Helper Hat attachment awkwardly positioned inside of the Helminth Charger’s head and neck.

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Hotfix 20.0.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed crash when changing Armor for the Helminth Charger.

patchlogs.name: Octavia’s Anthem: Hotfix 20.0.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Helminth Charger Codex diorama freezing the game.

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Update 20
patchlogs.changes: oh wait, that’s the newly reskinned Helminth Charger! With a whole new look comes a new attitude.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Update 19.6.0 + 19.6.0.1
patchlogs.additions: As stated and shown on Devstream #85, the Helminth Cure is here. By now, a majority of Tenno have been faced with a persistent and protruding infection on numerous Warframes. For those with a fully 7-day matured Helminth Cyst, the individual permanent cure awaits you in the Helminth Infirmary. The completion of Glast Gambit is not required to have your Helminth Cyst removed, and once the cure has been administered that Warframe will not be granted access back into the room and can no longer be infected. Keep in mind that breeding a Helminth Charger requires a mature Helminth Cyst to be drained

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.5.5
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed incorrect Helminth Charger Codex entry.

name: Huras Kubrow
description: Prized for its ability to sneak up on unsuspecting prey, the Huras Kubrow were first used as hunting companions by the Orokin elite. Orokin Era Tenno soon adapted the strain for use in covert missions and assassinations.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.11.5
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue allowing Shade Sentinel and Huras Kubrow cloaks to stealth players still firing weapons with large magazines.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.0.2
patchlogs.fixes: ·         Fixed Huras Kubrow’s Stalk not properly applying to Players.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.2.0
patchlogs.changes:
Huras Kubrow Hunt Mod will now prompt Kubrow to pick an enemy near other enemies (since the charge is AoE).
Added knockdown to Huras Kubrow charge that should make enemies hit suffer an entertaining knockback.
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed issue with Huras Kubrow Hunt Mod where charge would end after 5 frames of no movement.
Fixed issue with Huras Kubrow Hunt Mod where all Kubrow in mission would share the same cooldown recharge time.

name: Incubator Power Core
description: This device facilitates the growth of a Kubrow clone, from birth to puppyhood.

components.name: Argon Crystal
components.description: Void based radioactive resource that decays every day it is out of the void.

components.name: Blueprint
components.description: This device facilitates the growth of a Kubrow clone, from birth to puppyhood.

components.name: Control Module
components.description: Autonomy processor for Robotics. A Corpus design.

components.name: Nano Spores
components.description: Fibrous technocyte tumour. Handle Infested tissue with caution.

patchlogs.name: Update 21: Chains of Harrow
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Kavat and Kubrow bundles from the Market not awarding Incubator Power Cores.

name: Kavat Genetic Code
description: Contains the genetic code sequence of a Kavat.

patchlogs.name: The War Within: Update 19.3.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Kavat Genetic Codes from Alerts not being given out in intended quantities. Alerts will now grant 5 Kavat Genetic Codes.

patchlogs.name: The War Within: 19.1.0 Ash Revisited
patchlogs.changes: 10x Kavat Genetic Codes have been added to Alerts!

name: Kubrow Egg
description: This egg is used to transplant the genetic code of a Kubrow onto a Kubrow clone.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Mirage Prime 22.7.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a loss of functionality when attempting to purchase a Kubrow Egg from Darvo.

patchlogs.name: Update 21: Chains of Harrow
patchlogs.additions: Special item pickups now display on the left side with emphasis rather than on the bottom resource bumper. You'll notice items like Kubrow Eggs, Weapon Blueprints, and other special items picked up in game now have more pizazz!
patchlogs.changes: Kubrow Eggs are now shown in the Inventory screen under the 'Misc' Tab.

patchlogs.name: Update 18.3
patchlogs.changes:
Kubrow Egg drop rate has been increased overall. 
Kubrow Egg drop rate increased significantly when playing the Howl of the Kubrow Quest during the Egg hunting Mission.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.0.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed issue causing Kubrow Eggs not to appear in the UI after installing the Incubator upgrade.

patchlogs.name: Warframe: Archwing
patchlogs.changes: Added some new items to the mix: Oxium, Argon, R5 Fusion Core Pack, Kubrow Egg.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 14.5.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue with Kubrow Eggs not appearing as purchased in the Market.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 14.0.6
patchlogs.fixes: A new visual effect has been added when a Kubrow Egg is picked up.

name: Nai-Zhen Kubrow Collar
description: Records the genetic memory and DNA sequence of a Kubrow, allowing it to be reconstructed in the Incubator.

name: Raksa Kubrow
description: Designed by the Orokin to be the perfect companion, a Kubrow was never far from its master's side. Loyal and obedient, these creatures made ideal bodyguards. Equipped with shield generators for added protection, their fierce growl could paralyze any attacker with fear.

patchlogs.name: Update 17: Echoes Of The Sentient
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Raksa Kubrow’s Howl sometimes not playing.

name: Sahasa Kubrow
description: Enterprising Orokin genetic designers recognized that the Kubrow's affinity for games of fetch could be used for more serious endeavors. They soon developed a strain adept at reconnaissance and contraband recovery. Tenno often used the creatures to help resupply while in the field.

components.name: Blueprint
components.description: Enterprising Orokin genetic designers recognized that the Kubrow's affinity for games of fetch could be used for more serious endeavors. They soon developed a strain adept at reconnaissance and contraband recovery. Tenno often used the creatures to help resupply while in the field.

components.name: Incubator Power Core
components.description: This device facilitates the growth of a Kubrow clone, from birth to puppyhood.

patchlogs.name: Beasts of the Sanctuary: Update 22.19.0
patchlogs.changes: Sahasa Kubrows can no longer dig up Resources in Onslaught.

name: Smeeta Kavat
description: This sly feline is playful yet devious.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Hotfix 22.13.3
patchlogs.changes: Smeeta Kavat’s Charm Critical Chance and Energy recharge Buffs no longer apply to Operators.

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Update 21.1.0 + 21.1.0.1
patchlogs.changes: Improved the Smeeta Kavat Mischief buff for Operators. Relevant buffs on the Warframes will always be transferred to the Operator and vice versa.

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Hotfix 21.0.9
patchlogs.changes: Operators are now affected by the Smeeta Kavat Mischief/Charm buffs.

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Update 20
patchlogs.changes: Lowered the specular lightning on the Smeeta Kavat to address ‘plastic’ looking issues.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Update 19.5
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Missing Smeeta Kavat icon and wrong Adarza icon

patchlogs.name: Update: Specters of the Rail
patchlogs.changes:
Allows Smeeta Kavat to become invisible while a decoy Kavat draws fire by running toward the enemy.
Smeeta Kavat bestows its owner with good fortune during the course of a mission.

name: Sunika Kubrow
description: Once the value of Orokin guard-pets had been realized, Orokin scientists began experimenting with strains designed for combat. These were no longer household pets but superior war animals bred for ferocity and aggression.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 14.0.9
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed some awkward wording in a string about the Sunika Kubrow.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 14.0.5
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed an issue with Sunika Kubrows not coming with their proper Mods when purchased.
PSA: A script is in progress to give mods to those account affected by the Sunika Kubrows not coming with the proper mods.
